TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, KSP2 is the best game you ever play. but you had to wait 40 years for it to come out.

I wish for Dres to be removed.

Granted, but the legion of hardcore Dres fans tries to cancel ksp

 

I wish that we knew how to go FTL

Granted we do but you still don't.

 

I wish that I had a 6 sleeper cuddy cabin boat

Granted. You pull an old wooden boat from water and overturn it. Now six can sleep in that cabin.

I wish next time you find a cuddy, too (idk what's that, but probably useful)

Granted he finds his boat but the payment for him to buy it is made in full by you!

 

i wish i was in space.

 

143208042021

Granted. It is all around you. (ain't I nice, could have said outerspace and no helmet   )

I wish to have back the eye sight I had 15 years ago.

Granted but with better eyesight you traded wisdom and knowledge... Too far... 25 years worth.

 

I wish that my get up and go hadn't got up and left.

Granted. Now you never had it and always stayed in bed.

(Hope you are feeling good by the way.)

I wish to know where the largest unearthed diamond in the world is.

Granted, but it will melt into lava in 2 seconds, ending it's existence. An it's to deep to rescue.

I wish KSP had ejection seats.

3 hours ago, Jeb_Needs_A_Parachute said:

Granted, but it will melt into lava in 2 seconds, ending it's existence. An it's to deep to rescue.

I wish KSP had ejection seats.

Granted already .Command seats can eject kerbals and a decoupler and separatron can eject a command chair. But your plane crashed into the mountain before you ejected.

I wish I could make a diamond myself.

But its made of plastic.

i wish i have a yacht.

Granted. You have a nice little model yacht for display only. It doesn't even float.

 

I wish the world had a coke to sing.

Granted. It's called  Columbia.

I wish you were singing the song I am thinking of.

Granted. You start thinking about the song I'm singing.

I wish you got a word, as it's full of Russian jargonisms.

Granted. I got 1 word of that.

I wish to launch ships into orbit using a magnetic accelerator.

Granted. You launch a magnetic accelerator ins tead of the upper stage.

I wish the rockets were fueling by the air drag.

Granted. You can now refuel rockets in flight, but the only thing fast enough is another rocket, costs are astronomical, the CoM is off balanced, and air pressure rips the hose off half the time.

 

I wish to visually see an actual black hole.

Granted. It’s the last thing you see before you are sucked in.

I wish for a 1:72 F-104 star fighter.

Granted. It crashes into the countryside of a 1:72 scale model of Germany.

I wish for a fresh, peaceful, apolitical, non-venerated and non-transmogrifying Russet potato.

Not granted. Russet has already eaten it.

I wish a new potato had grown soon.

Granted. Potatoe man eats you

I wish for a pizza

Granted. It's from Little Caesar's.

I wish for a fresh, peaceful, apolitical, non-venerated and non-transmogrifying Russet potato.

Granted, that potato exists, but you are unable to access it. 
 

I wish for pentaborane to make a comeback

Granted. As quickly as it returns it fades away!

i wish i was here.

163108062021

Granted. You're also hard of here-ing.

I wish for access to a fresh, peaceful, apolitical, non-venerated and non-transmogrifying Russet potato.
